text: Ilaria Occhini (28 March 1934 â€“ 20 July 2019) was an Italian actress. She starred in more than 30 movies. Her best known roles were Doctor and the Healer, Welcome to Home Gori and Loose Cannons. Her husband was screenwriter Raffaele La Capria. Occhini died in Rome on 20 July 2019 at the age of 85.Addio all'attrice Ilaria Occhini, aveva 85 anni ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1934 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Actors from Florence
title: Ilaria Occhini
